name: Slamming Slimes
description:
This game is an entry for both Ludum Dare 46 and Torneo GJA/Rushing2600

Jump you way up to survive!

Help this poor slime escape both the rising lava and  the guard's attacks!

Hold Space to charge your jump and make it higher, then move in the air with the Arrow Keys, how high can you reach?

Credits:
  • Programming/Graphics/Audio: Icefox (@zettaizorro)
  • Font: WildLeoKnight
